Text:
Madonna has placed several fake songs of hers on various P2P-sites.

The fake songs contain no sound material - except for this short sound-bit.

Madonna says "What the fuck do you think you're doing ?" ..... funny isn't it ? SPREAD IT !
Come on guys, she is a human being. This really isn't funny at all...it's the same as recording ANYBODY saying what the fuck and making a torrent. What a waste.
